        Parameters:

      • createShelf

        public boolean createShelf(java.lang.String genre,
                  int capacity)
        Creates a shelf to hold books of the specified genre and being able to hold up to the number of books specified by the capacity.
        Parameters:
        genre - the name of the genre of books that will be put on this shelf
        capacity - the maximum number of books that will be able to be put on this shelf
        Returns:
        true if the shelf is created successfully, false if not

      • addBook

        public boolean addBook(java.lang.String title,
              java.lang.String author,
              java.lang.String ISBN)
        Adds the book with the given title, author, and ISBN number into the library from the catalog.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the book to be added
        author - the author of the book to be added
        ISBN - the ISBN code of the book to be added
        Returns:
        true if the book has been successfully added, false if not

      • removeBook

        Removes the book with the given title and author from the library.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the book to be removed
        author - the author of the book to be removed
        Returns:
        true if the book has been successfully removed, false if not
